nodes.text: @ShadeMasterFlex @TELFARGLOBAL Okay I can see that. This is definitely a short term solution and I agree that something else has to be done for a long term solution.

@CallMeIfy_ @TELFARGLOBAL Right. I believe the company has the potential to be around longer than the 2-5 years brands have these days before the fashion culture phases them out because of their values & their quality. I don’t want some bots ruining that for them.

@CallMeIfy_ @TELFARGLOBAL I’m not concerned about the consumer getting the bag only- I’m concerned about a black owned business not being able to flourish in the long run like other fashion brands do due to things like reselling especially with their co message/mission statement.

@ShadeMasterFlex @TELFARGLOBAL Yeah I hear you but if you’re able to preorder the bag you want, why would you buy from a reseller? The bots are gonna exist but now we don’t have to completely fight them for the bag because we’ll get one regardless

@CallMeIfy_ @TELFARGLOBAL Yes but the point is the bots will STILL get access to it, further inflating the prices on their bags which doesn’t solve the issue of inclusivity. They could have easily done this with a program of a elevated cache system to fend off the bots- similar to SNKRS etc
@AyoSandee @ShadeMasterFlex @CallMeIfy_ @TELFARGLOBAL It won’t! This just increased accessibility.

@AyoSandee @CallMeIfy_ @TELFARGLOBAL It happens with Jordan’s all the time for example- even when they aren’t exactly limited. Resale retail imo doesn’t help the integrity of the brand. I love the brands message & love what they want to do, wish to do with it. But Resale culture doesn’t promote that at all.

@AyoSandee @CallMeIfy_ @TELFARGLOBAL Because it’s exactly that- it’s done via resale. I get their trying to say the more you supply the demand will level out but I don’t think the point was leveling out the demand (only) I think it was to keep the integrity of the brand too with “affordable luxury”
@CallMeIfy_ @TELFARGLOBAL Hire some black web designers/coders, there are MANY willing to work who are highly talented & can help them provide a better customer exp.
@ShadeMasterFlex @TELFARGLOBAL It’s unlimited so everyone can order
Dammit this DOESNT HELP @TELFARGLOBAL now all the damn bots just gonna pre order! https://t.co/CC7KFvglre
